import { useContext } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { ModeContext } from "./ModeContext"; function Contact() { const [show, setShow, language, setLanguage, mobile] = useContext(ModeContext); const sty = { height: mobile.contact }; return (

{language.contact.title}


{/* Stack the columns on mobile by making one full-width and the other half-width */}
); } export default Contact;
